Note:: Weight Loss Diet Plan For Diabetic Patients

Day1.Breakfast (294 calories, 41 g carbohydra: 1/2 cup oats cooked in 1/2 cup each 2% milk and water,1 medium plum, chopped,4 walnut halves, chopped,Top oats with plum and walnuts.
Day1.A.M. Snack (96 calories, 18 g carbohydra: 3/4 cup blueberries, 1/4 nonfat plain Greek yogurt,Top blueberries with yogurt.
Day1.Lunch (319 calories, 37 g carbohydrates): Turkey & Apple Cheddar Melt, 2 slices whole-wheat bread,2 tsp. whole-grain mustard, divided1/2 medium apple, sliced, 2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided,1 cup mixed greens,Top one slice of bread with 1 tsp. mustard, apple, turkey and 1 Tbsp. cheese. Top the other slice of bread with the remaining 1 tsp. mustard and 1 Tbsp.cheese. Toast sandwich halves face-up in a toaster oven until the cheese begins to melt and bubble. Add the mixed greens to the sandwich just before serving,Look for a deli turkey with less than 150 mg sodium per 1-ounce serving.
Day1.P.M. Snack (58 calories, 16 g carbohydra: 1/2 medium apple, sliced, 1/2 tsp. honey, Pinch of cinnamon,Drizzle the apple slices with honey and sprinkle with cinnamon.
Day1.Dinner (417 calories, 54 g carbohydrates: 2 1/2 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, 1 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast,Make Ahead Tip: Save 1 3/4 cups soup for lunch on Day 2, and another 2 cups for lunch on Day 6.
Day1.Daily Total: 1,185 calories, 60 g protein, 166 g carbohydrates, 29 g fiber, 66 g sugar, 35 g fat, 9 g saturated fat, 1,539 mg sodium

Day2.Breakfast (297 calories, 33 g carbohydra: 1 serving Everything Bagel Avocado Toast,1/2 cup blueberries,25 pistachios
Day2.Lunch (314 calories, 47 g carbohydrates): 1 3/4 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup,2 slices whole-wheat baguette (cut Â¼ inch thick)
Day2.P.M. Snack (95 calories, 25 g carbohydra: Cinnamon Apples, 1 medium apple, sliced, Cinnamon to taste,Sprinkle apple slices with cinnamon.
Day2.Dinner (420 calories, 48 g carbohydrates: 2 1/2 cups Lentil & Roasted Vegetable Salad with Green Goddess Dressing,1 serving Frozen Chocolate-Banana Bites, to enjoy after dinner
Day2.Daily Total:: 1,179 calories, 39 g protein, 166 g carbohydrates, 35 g fiber, 65 g sugar, 47 g fat, 9 g saturated fat, 1,425 mg sodium

Day3.Breakfast (289 calories, 27 g carbohydra: 1 serving Yogurt with Blueberries & Honey, 1 tsp. ground flaxseed, 6 walnut halves, chopped or whole,Add flaxseed to yogurt for an added boost of fiber and omega-3s. Top with chopped walnuts, or leave the walnuts whole to have on the side.
Day3.Lunch (347 calories, 48 g carbohydrates): 3 1/2 cups Mixed Greens with Lentils & Sliced Apple
Day3.Dinner (490 calories, 52 g carbohydrates: 1 1/3 cups Chicken Sausage & Peppers,1/2 cup cooked brown rice,1/2 tsp. extra-virgin olive oil,1/2 tsp. no-salt-added Italian seasoning, Salt to taste,Season rice with oil, Italian seasoning and salt. Serve chicken, sausage & peppers over the rice,1 1/2 cups mixed greens, 1/4 cup shredded carrot, 1/4 cup sliced cucumbers, 1 Tbsp. Garlic-Oregano Vinaigrette, or a premade Italian salad dressing,Combine greens, carrot, cucumber and vinaigrette.
Day3.Note: When buying premade salad dressings, look for one made without added sugars. And, choose one made with olive oil or canola oil.
Day3.Daily Total: 1,218 calories, 63 g protein, 151 g carbohydrates, 31 g fiber, 75 g sugar, 45 g fat, 9 g saturated fat, 830 mg sodium

Day4.Breakfast (295 calories, 42 g carbohydra: 1/2 cup oats cooked in 1/2 cup each 2% milk and water, 1 tsp. ground flaxseed, 1 medium plum, chopped, 3 walnut halves, chopped,Mix oatmeal and flaxseed; top with plum and walnuts.
Day4.Lunch (350 calories, 46 g carbohydrates): 1 serving Veggie & Hummus Sandwich, 3 dried apricots
Day4.Dinner (450 calories, 41 g carbohydrates: 1 serving Lemon-Herb Salmon with Caponata & Farro
Day4.Note:: If you don't have farro? You can substitute another whole grain you have on hand, like brown rice.
Day4.Daily Total:: 1,209 calories, 61 g protein, 158 g carbohydrates, 32 g fiber, 61 g sugar, 43 g fat, 8 g saturated fat, 1,032 mg sodium

Day5.Breakfast (276 calories, 44 g carbohydra: 1 serving Everything Bagel Avocado Toast,20 cherries
Day5.Turkey & Pear Pita Melt:: 1/2 large whole-wheat pita round (save the other half for lunch on Day 7),3 1/2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey,1/2 medium pear, sliced, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup mixed greens,1 medium plum
Day5.Note: Stuff pita pocket with turkey, pear and cheese. Toast in a toaster oven until the cheese starts to melt. Add greens to the pita just before eating.
Day5.Cinnamon Pears: 1/2 medium pear, sliced, Cinnamon to taste,Sprinkle pear slices with cinnamon.
Day5.Dinner (448 calories, 38 g carbohydrates: 1 serving Spaghetti Squash & Meatballs, 1 slice whole-wheat baguette (cut 1/4 inch thick), toasted,1/2 Tbsp. goat cheese, 1/4 tsp. fresh chopped rosemary,Toast baguette and top with cheese and rosemary.
Day5.Daily Total:: 1,176 calories, 64 g protein, 151 g carbohydrates, 29 g fiber, 74 g sugar, 37 g fat, 9 g saturated fat, 1,738 mg sodium

Day6.Breakfast (291 calories, 28 g carbohydra: 1 serving Yogurt with Blueberries & Honey, 2 tsp. ground flaxseed, 5 walnut halves, chopped,Mix yogurt and flaxseed. Serve topped with walnuts.
Day6.Dinner (422 calories, 53 g carbohydrates: 1 serving Apple-Glazed Chicken with Spinach,1/2 cup Steamed Butternut Squash,2 tsp. extra-virgin olive oil,1/2 tsp. fresh thyme or 1/8 tsp. dried,Salt and pepper to taste,Toss squash with oil and thyme. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Day6.Daily Total:: 1,184 calories, 78 g protein, 156 g carbohydrates, 27 g total fiber, 88 g sugar, 34 g fat, 5 g saturated fat, 1,541 mg sodium

Day7.Breakfast (300 calories, 40 g carbohydra: 2 Blueberry-Pecan Pancakes,3 Tbsp. blueberries, fresh or frozen,2 tsp. ground flaxseed,Microwave blueberries until soft and sauce-like, about 1 minute. Stir in the flaxseed for an extra fiber kick, and serve with the pancakes.
Day7.Lunch (325 calories, 35 g carbohydrates): 2 cups mixed greens,1/2 cup sliced cucumber,1/4 cup grated carrot,1 1/2 Tbsp. Garlic-Oregano Vinaigrette, or a premade Italian salad dressing,1/2 large whole-wheat pita round, toasted1/4 cup hummus
Day7.Note:: Combine greens, cucumber, carrot and vinaigrette.
Day7.Dinner (444 calories, 48 g carbohydrates: 1 serving Mushroom-Sauced Pork Chops, 1/2 cup cooked brown rice,3/4 cup Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto
